plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is science fiction/fantasy, their favourite plot is dark and twisted, their favourite setting is a parallel universe, their favourite writing style is descriptive and vivid, their favourite length is medium-length (novella or novella-length novel), their favourite topic is time travel, their favourite pacing is fast-paced, their favourite narrative structure is nonlinear, and their favourite themes are morality and identity.
